ygData.subject: Re: Sources of combine weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: So what makes you think this is something you are supposed to know? Quests are often supposed to require some effort to solve the problem and not just be a
ygData.messageBody:
So what makes you think this is something you are supposed to know? Quests
are often supposed to require some effort to "solve" the problem and not
just be a straightforward go here and do this issue. This particular
instance seems to me to reflect exactly the sort of things you encounter in
life. The job Verant has done is nothing short of spectacular. It seems far
too easy for some people to be overly critical of anyone or anything that
doesn't fit exactly in the mold of how THEY think it should be. Just my
opinion.

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
Fennin Ro

>My guess is that once again Verant has failed to write reasonably clear
>English.
>
>The quest source in Kelethin says who to deliver to in Freeport. That
>person says if you want to find out about mail talk to another person in
>the same room.
<snip>

>I know they mean well, but Verant's consistent inability accurately to
>communicate what we're supposed to know results in considerable frustration
>and wasted effort in the game.
<snip>
